title: Boutique Luxury in the Heart of Seattle with Nightly Drinks
description:
Discover the bustling streets, marketplaces and lively music scene of the Emerald City from the heart of Seattle's prestigious Queen Anne neighbourhood at The Maxwell Hotel - A Staypineapple Hotel. This art-inspired boutique property is only a few minutes' walk from iconic landmarks including the Seattle Center, Space Needle, Pike Place Market, Seattle Opera and Pacific Northwest Ballet.

Your Seattle city stay includes daily Grab & Go breakfast (fresh fruit, coffee and pastry), one nightly beer, glass of wine or soft drink per person, a welcome basket featuring locally sourced artisan crackers, cheese and chocolates, daily hotel amenity fees, complimentary Wi-Fi and guaranteed 2pm late checkout.

**Travelling with family?** Check out the upgrade for up to four people.
location_description: The Maxwell Hotel - A Staypineapple Hotel 2020
offer_address: 300 Roy St, Seattle, WA 98109, United States

title: Delightful Downtown Seattle Escape with Italian Restaurant, Wine Cellar & Gym
description: Enjoy a tantalising stay at Kimpton Hotel Vintage Seattle, an IHG Hotel, the urban outpost of Washington wine country. Let your tastebuds take the lead during nightly tastings guided by the hotel’s knowledgeable concierge-meets-sommelier. Drink in the vibrant city of Seattle by day, and return to the hotel at night for award-winning Italian fare paired with the perfect drop, and a restful night's sleep in your spacious room.
location_description: Kimpton Hotel Vintage Seattle, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1100 Fifth Avenue, Seattle, Washington 98101, United States

title: Sleek Seattle City Break Overlooking Iconic Space Needle with Modern Bar & Grille
description: Enjoy the laidlack Pacific Northwest living while connecting to the city's vibrance with a sojourn at Crowne Plaza Seattle - Downtown, an IHG Hotel. This urban sanctuary puts you in the perfect position to explore popular landmarks, from the Space Needle to Pike Place Market. Savour regional flavours at Regatta Bar and Grille, open daily for breakfast and dinner, or discover the city's thriving food scene, full of fresh seafood and farm-to-table recipes.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Seattle - Downtown, an IHG Hotel

title: Elegant Pan Pacific Seattle Stay in Stylish South Lake Union Neighbourhood
description: Experience the allure of the Pacific Northwest with a stay at Pan Pacific Seattle, located in the heart of the city's thriving South Lake Union district just a stone's throw from iconic landmarks like the Space Needle and Pike Place Market. Dine on locally sourced fare at the hotel's signature restaurant, South Lake Kitchen + Bar, or sip on artisanal cocktails at the alfresco bar. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the vibrant arts scene, eclectic boutiques and coffee culture that make Seattle so unique.

title: Elegant City Stay in Seattle's Trendy Belltown Neighbourhood
description: Kimpton Palladian Hotel, an IHG Hotel, sits in the heart of Seattle's vibrant Belltown neighbourhood, offering guests convenient access to the iconic Pike Place Market, the scenic waterfront and an array of Seattle's finest new restaurants, charming cafés and trendy boutiques. Once you're done exploring, relax in your masculine-chic styled room with luxe amenities and contemporary furnishings that reflect Belltown’s hip heritage.
location_description: Kimpton Palladian Hotel, an IHG Hotel

title: Top-Rated Boutique Luxury in the Heart of Seattle
description:
Discover the vibrant streets, bustling marketplaces and lively music scene of the Emerald City from the heart of Seattle's prestigious Queen Anne neighbourhood at The Maxwell Hotel - rated among the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. This art-inspired boutique property is only a few minutes' walk from iconic landmarks, including the Seattle Center, Space Needle, Museum of Pop Culture, Pike Place Market, Seattle Opera and Pacific Northwest Ballet.

The whimsical Staypineapple Hotels are built as celebrations of the living arts. The lobby, guestrooms and stylish indoor pool are dotted with bold and beautiful abstract pieces and decorative tiling, with Staypineapple's signature yellow accents and pineapple logo making a frequent appearance. The chic Pineapple Bistro & Bar is an understated tribute to elegance and artistic excellence - with an extravagant floor-to-ceiling digital art wall - and the perfect place to enjoy a build-your-own mac and cheese masterpiece or new favourite cocktail around a welcoming community table and u-shaped bar. Combining unmatched sophistication and charm with modern chic, thoughtful features and gracious service, The Maxwell Hotel is sure to put a smile on your face.
offer_address: 300 Roy St, Seattle, WA 98109, United States

title: Bustling Seattle City Stay in the Heart of Downtown Business District
description: Nestled in the heart of Seattle, Kimpton Hotel Monaco Seattle, an IHG Hotel, exudes an irresistible blend of sophistication and charm. Each elegantly appointed room offers plush furnishings and sumptuous bedding. Indulge in the finest chef-crafted burgers and milkshakes at Outlier restaurant whilst enjoying a glass of wine on the cozy outdoor patio, equipped with fire pits. This pet-friendly hotel comes with a 24-hour fitness facility and a yoga mat in every room.
location_description: Kimpton Hotel Monaco Seattle, an IHG Hotel

title: Heritage Luxury in the Heart of Seattle
description: Stay in Seattle's historic West Edge neighbourhood, just steps from the Elliott Bay waterfront, at The Alexis Royal Sonesta Hotel - a charming hotel built in 1901 and luxuriously updated with modern comforts. For mouthwatering dishes, rare whiskeys and handcrafted cocktails, spend an evening at The Bookstore Bar & Café. If an afternoon of pampering sounds appealing, Chroma Spa offers a tranquil space to enjoy a full-body massage or botanical hair treatment. And when you're looking to get moving, the onsite fitness centre features Peloton bikes that are guaranteed to elevate your workout.
